responses: Hello! How can I help you with your food order today?
Hi there! What can I assist you with?

patterns: How do I place an order?
How do I make an order?
responses: You can place an order by selecting a restaurant, choosing your items, and proceeding to checkout.
Simply browse restaurants, add items to your cart, and confirm payment to place an order.
We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and e-wallets.
You can pay using cash, online banking, or supported e-wallets.
Delivery usually takes between 30â€“60 minutes depending on distance and restaurant preparation time.
Estimated delivery time will be shown before you confirm your order.

patterns: How do I cancel an order?
I want to cancel my order
responses: You may cancel your order before the restaurant starts preparing it.
Order cancellation depends on the order status and restaurant policy.

patterns: How do I get a refund?
Can I get my money back?
responses: Refunds are processed if there is an issue with your order, such as missing or incorrect items.
You can request a refund through the app under order history.
You can contact customer support through the Help Center in the app.
Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.
Thanks for using our service. Have a great day!
